oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Versuchsgut Lindhof, Versuchsbetrieb für Ökologischen Landbau und extensive Landnutzungssysteme der Christian-Albrechts-Universität zu Kiel
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
Crop husbandry
Farm economics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Objectives: - Optimisation of yield and quality of different organic crops (especially wheat, oats, oil seed rape, pulses, potatoes, permanent grassland as well as grass/clover in crop rotation) - Analysis of nitrogen fluxes in organic farming - Comparison of integrated, organic and extensive cropping systems with respect to yields, nitrogen balance, nitrate-leaching, soil fertility, biodiversity and economical returns - Development of simulation-models for plant production
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Facility} Versuchsgut Lindhof, Versuchsbetrieb für Ökologischen Landbau und extensive Landnutzungssysteme der Christian-Albrechts-Universität zu Kiel. [Experimental farm Lindhof, Integrated Research Project: „Organic Farming and Extensive Land-Use-Systems“, Christian-Albrechts-University of Kiel.] Facility Leader(s): Taube, Prof. Dr. Friedhelm and Loges, Dr. Ralf, Christian-Albrechts-Universität Kiel, Institut für Pflanzenbau und Pflanzenzüchtung.
